description: Optimized text search quality and token efficiency: Implemented field boosting, match position boosting, symbol kind weighting, and quality filtering. Routed text search to hybrid mode (semantic+FTS) for better results. Achieved 88% precision@5 (up from 46%) and 80% token savings through TOON format improvements (threshold 20→5, default output_format json→auto, default limit 50→20). Created comprehensive benchmark suite to measure search quality improvements.
